mapper.select: select * from PAYMENT where MEMBER_NO=#{member_no, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PAYMENT(MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PWD, MEMBER_ADDRESS, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_PHONE, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_GRADE, MEMBER_DATE) VALUES(MEMBER_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{member_id}, #{member_pwd}, #{member_address}, #{member_email}, #{member_phone}, #{member_name}, 'BASIC', SYSTIMESTAMP )
mapper.update: update PAYMENT set DELIVERY_NUM=#{delivery_num}, SUCCESS=2 where PAYMENT_NUM=#{payment_num}
